root: ^Mr. Stone, why do you have the missing doorknob?
^This one that was in your bag?
^Oh, that's not a doorknob, silly. It's a cool rock I found eariler.
^I needed to use the closet out back, drank too much glue as usual.
^That fancy bowler hat just left the closet, snuck out back for some reason.
^Who knows what the rich are up to, eh?
^That's when I laid eyes on the prettiest rock I'd ever seen.
^She was stuck to the wall, poor thing! It took me a couple tries, but in the end I set her free.
^I--hold on! Do you mean to say you saw Mr. Bowler head towards the scene of his murder, the same day he was killed?
^You just mentioned you saw a bowler hat leave the closet!
^Did you notice anyone else in the hallway?
^Sweetie, I appreciate the conversation, but my food's getting cold.
^Mr. Stone, please! Did you see anything else suspicious that day?
^No more talking until I finish my meal!
